content.detailedDescription: On friday may12, 2017 i was leaving to go to the store. when i stepped outside i saw a bright red glowing light in the sky. for a split second i thought it was just a low flying airplane or maybe a helicopter. after a few seconds i realized it was neither. there was no engine noise and it was moving way too fast. i pulled out my iphone and started recording. when i zoomed in it looked more like a yellowish/orange disc flying across the sky. there was pretty good detail. i zoomed out to show the whole sky and when i zoomed back in ithe object had clearly gained quite a bit of altitude. it continued on its path until it disappeared over the horizon. only took about 90 seconds, maybe even faster than that. i was so amazed at what i was seeing that  i didn't pay that much attention to it. all i know is that i try to watch all shuttle and rocket launches from cape canaveral and i can view these from behind my house so i have a pretty good idea of how long it takes those rockets to leave sight. this was waaaaaay faster. i have already reported this sighting and sent the video to a ufo group in florida who quickly responded that they think i took a video of venus or jupiter...Lol! i have always been intrigued by astronomy and the possibility of life that exists other than how we know it. i can say with certainty that this was not a planet.
content.summary: Looked like a bright red ball in the sky when i started recording with my phone and zoomed in it was definitely a disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
Walked outside and had a sense to start filming the horizon. grey black portal distortion appeared and ufo came into view through portal i took a picture in addition to video. its not the greatest quality iphone plus but its clear as day. i didn't fully realize what i had until i uploaded to laptop and viewed on big screen.

three days before this i filmed a green orb at the garden of the gods, its in full motion on the video.

one month i woke up to my third eye dent on my forehead and black below and running down my eyes. i paniced and went into a state of shock. when shock subsided i took a picture of the third eye dent and it shows black running out of the "dent"

i woke up 3 weeks ago with a welt in the shape of small sunglasses and took a picture
content.summary: I filmed a grey black swirl portal open up and ufo (its dark and blurry but totally noticable) ufo came into view from portal

content.detailedDescription: 1 (509) 853-8574 at the time which was between 12 and 2 i was at the selah little league fields with a girl which is located on mcgonagle rd off of gore in selah washington. at first it looked like a really bright star but it kept getting bigger and brighter at first it was one light as it got closer it was 3. at first i figured it was an unknown vehicle as there is a military base in our town. it's like it knew i was there and could see it. i couldn't speak i was shocked although i felt joy afterwards and no fear. when it seemed the craft noticed me it moved diagonally and very smooth behind a nearby cloud. it was so quick smooth the way it moved i'm not sure how it was possible to be so powerful yet so quiet. no beam was emitted it really seemed like more of a test drive the way it avoided me. my spirituality durastically changed from christian to agnostic soon afterward. i was so happy to feel like there was other life out there but i'm not ruling out our own technology. i lost sight of the object behind a cloud and did not see it shoot up or come out of the clouds. the undocumented flying object was triangular shaped with 3 lights inside each corner and descended right above me . although at first the light was in the middle.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked loke a bright star at first. till it was 200 feet above me. noticed i saw it moved behind clouds diagonal patterns, very smooth

content.detailedDescription: Was walking to the pool at my condos saturday it was close to 5pm. there was something the sun reflected light off of that made me originally look up. i saw what looked like a big metal object i told my husband to look. he did. he didn't know what it was. i thought something was falling out of the sky. i stood there and watched the object for a few minutes. as it got closer i could see it was clearly a black boomerang shaped object. perfect boomerang shape. no noise came from it. it was twisting and turning. slowly like hovering but slowly moving around. there was an airplane in the sky at the same moment. higher up than the object. i've never seen anything like that before. someone else had to have seen it. it was a clear day not one cloud in the sky. possible drone? you tell me. it was large and perfectly shaped like a boomerang. it kept twisting and turning and went north east. if i could compare the size of the object to something i would say maybe the size of a smart car. i can't be exact but it was large enough that others had to have witnessed this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked up saw something thought it was falling, stopped and watched it was twisting and turning it was a boomerang shape, no clouds out.

content.detailedDescription: Not sure
content.summary: Not sure

content.detailedDescription: I and a friend camped for 2 nights in a local forest. around midnight we saw a bright , soundless white light/orb flying slowly just about the tops of the fir trees . we started to follow it from a distance of 100m . it descended into a clearing where electricity pilons run . we watched through the trees from around 75m away on a higher elevation. there was a lot of light and some activity but it was hard to make out. we decided to go back to camp and not get any closer to it. thinking back to it now. we did not take note of the fact of time . so unsure of any loss of time.
content.summary: Camping and followed a craft which landed in a valley . obscured by trees . two of us witnessed event . landed near pillons.

content.detailedDescription:
On april 2 2017 i was awoken at 4:18 am , was immediately rushed outside by instinct .  as i looked to the south i noticed a fast moving star light over 14,500 mph towards the north then changed direction to the east as quickly as it appeared another star light appeared as the one launched a weapon, the east then moving light quickly turns around towards newly witnessed light . as then a loud earth shaking boom came from a weapon fired as blue flaming reaentry 
piece came quickly back to earth and burned up in the far west horizon. as then out of nowhere i looked at a deep dark ort cloud or dark matter or possibly a black hole directly from cassiopeia. then the fast moving then light moving directly south sparkles with gold flashes and is gone. my opinion for what i smelled, yes i could smell the dark matter. almost like burnt pieces of firewood . strong sense that the lighted spacecraft used binary star systems to hyper leap through time to reach earth as the battle i witnessed was a once and lifetime experience. days leading up this the moon is also a main key to this event, battle or war between other alien planets . 7 days leading up to the event i did witness many times star like lights moving 14,500 mph directly overhead traveling north too south as if to capture charged plasma from above earth to refuel their ships.
content.summary: Star like, moving est. 14,500 mph. ne then in the north a ort cloud or black appears, changing direction to the south bright sparkle and gone.

content.detailedDescription: Hanging out with some friends, when one of them noticed an odd object in the sky. we walked into the street to see what was going on, when we noticed strange lights in the sky. i took pictures and video of the instance. the objects seemed to just disappear, like either there was no more fuel, or they had reached such a distance that they vanished from perception.
content.summary: Orangish-yellow pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: One summer night in the 1970s (perhaps july, and sometime between 1973 and 1979), i was driving west along route 163 (east harbor road) near lakeside, ohio on the marblehead peninsula with my older sister and mother, shortly before 10pm, when we all saw a ufo up ahead and slightly to our right.  it was a huge rectangular object – apparently as long as one to 1½ football fields – with very many extremely bright lights around its edge (red, white, and blue) blinking sequentially, plus a few lights on top.  the object was at a low altitude (less than 1000 feet and maybe less than 500 feet) and moving slowly in a westerly or wnw direction, estimated at less than 50 mph.  the lights illuminated the sides of the object enough to show that the object was light-colored – possibly white, dull silver, or light tan.  for the next five to 10 minutes, until we turned off the road upon reaching home, we all watched the object in fascination.  it continued to move in total silence, never changing speed but slowly veering to the north and possibly gaining altitude slightly.  it appeared to be between ¼ mile and one mile away when first spotted, and took up more than half the windshield in our field of view.  the rectangular shape and configuration of lights were not consistent with any known type of blimp, while the very low speed and complete silence were not consistent with any conventional heavier-than-air craft.  i remember thinking “it’s so big and slow, how could it not fall out of the sky?”  we felt slightly apprehensive, but the object seemed benign.  upon reaching home, we remarked that “we’re glad it didn’t land in our front yard” and told my father what we had seen, but he dismissed our report as implausible.  we never reported the sighting to any authorities.
content.summary: Dramatic 40-year-old sighting recalled

content.detailedDescription: I was layin in my bed and all the light became red and an insectoid trapped me i could not move or speak or scream . this was when i was young im 41 years old now. i just want to tell you now. i was like 9 ish. but i remember like it happend yesterday. contact me if you want.
content.summary: An insectoid covered my bed, i could not move or scream it was very scary

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in a car driving north on morris rd when i saw what looked to be tall, see-through grey legs that moved backwards crossing the street. i was so fixated on the fact that they were backward moving and nothing i'd ever seen before that i didn't look up at the creature before it was gone. myfriend did though and she said it had what looked like a fox head.
content.summary: Saw creature crossing the road

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work west on seaman road when i saw two extremely bright pulsating lights, steady pattern but no other lights on or in the area of the bright lights. dual lights, side by side much larger wan aircraft exhaust. not sure what it was but believe it to be a ufo. in the video you will see the two pulsating lights with another bright object lower, the is a flare stack from a refinery. the path of the object was wsw towards toledo express airport, and i lost sight of object when it got too far into the distance and ground objects, houses, trees,etc obscured my view.
content.summary: Dual extremely bright flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: On may 13th at 9:10pm cdt at night in spring, texas (a north houston suburb), i observed a light high in the sky traveling from the south to the north.  at first i thought it was a satellite, traveling as fast as one i just observed a moment early moving from the northwest to the southeast over houston. just as this object passed the planet jupiter to its west, the brightness of the object intensified immensely for a second(e.G. like a flash of light), then made an abrupt 90 degree turn to the east with its brightness returning to its previous intensity. it continued to travel to the east and disappeared into the light pollution of the houston metropolitan sky. i've never seen a object make that sort of maneuver before. i heard no sound since it appeared to be at a very high attitude.
content.summary: Object changed directions aburptly

content.detailedDescription: West to east. no other aircraft. no wind.  rapidly moving. no sound. no clouds. orange light. had a comet-like umbrella in front of it. traveled at fairly high rate of speed. dropped rapidly towards northeast.
content.summary: Orange light with comet-like umbrella

content.detailedDescription: Saw a star-orb like craft orbiting just to the right of the moon the other night when i was walking through town. went outside later  (maybe an hour after i'd seen it) and it was gone. did anyone else see this?
content.summary: Observed star-orb like craft just to throw right of the moon on a clear night.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of my office located at south kings highway and chippewa street in st louis missouri on an april evening in 2008. i was facing west and noticed an object coming from the south heading north, at first i thought it was a helicopter, being in the military at the time i was looking at it to see if it was a military helicopter, as it got closer i noticed it was flying to high to be a helicopter and what at first i thought were its blades turned out to be some sort of halo or aura around it. i continued to watch it as it passed me and then it just changed direction without any sort of banking like a helicopter or airplane would do and headed west, i continued to watch it until i lost sight of it. due to its high altituted i had a hard time making out the shape and color of the object, but it definitely was not a helicopter or airplane.
content.summary: Appeared to have a halo around object, was travelling north and then abruptly switched to a western direction without banking

content.detailedDescription: I was stood at my door a bright been of bright light appeared separated into bits faded then appeared else were changed shape into a strip lasted about 30 min then went it was very strange but i felt calm never seen anything like it it was a correct line very square like i don't now why i was looking at the sky i was drawn to it i thought it was the horizon but when it changed shape vanished then appeared somewhere else i new straight away it was not normal it just stayed still exact shape until appeared again different shape glowing
content.summary: A strip of white light breaking into bits with a ora around it

content.detailedDescription: Went out the other night to observe a ufo i previously seen the night before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I believe i spotted it, and it spotted me.

content.detailedDescription: The area where this happened, the grass will not grow back, it's still twisted. no growth still tan/brown color.Grass,weeds,do not grow there. native wildlife avoids the area.Still after about 6 years,still growth is nill.Please contact me.Yes we had and have black helicopters circle the arera.
content.summary: Glowing craft of some sort.No bodies seen just landed and left grass twisted and will not grow back still, the grass will not grow back,but what was left still will not regrow the grass is still this old is here...... no age of grass.In the landing sight.

content.detailedDescription: Was in my room late at night and had seen something floating in the air first thought it was dust or something falling from the  ceiling but quickly noticed it was a very tiny spear like object completey white durning and after i felt a little weird and had blotches in my eyes the thing just hovered in my room then disappeared the only way i know how to explain what it did is to think of a bucket of paint if you drop a coin into paint think of how it was disappear it was like the air was the bucket of paint it's just ripped through it
content.summary: Small white  spear appeared in my room like a tiny bug was flying it

content.detailedDescription: On march 6, 2017, we observed two ufo's, from our back yard. one was hovering over the trees, in our direct view, the other was to our left, hovering over the trees to our left. my daughter and i both observed them. they flew in different directions as they left our back yard. one went up and to our left, mostly out of view. the other (that was directly behind our house) flew straight upward, and it began to blink like a star, as it was nearly out of view. both of the ufo's were blinking red and white lights, as they were moving our of our view. this occurred on march 6, 2017. another male reported seeing two ufo's on hwy 87, in milton, florida, just an hour or two before. i thought it may have been military testing, due to our location, so the following day, i asked two people that were eating at a nearby restaurant, and were wearing military uniforms. the female suggested that we ask the male, who she stated was a part of special ops. i asked if there was testing going on in the area, and he said that if there was, he wouldn't have that knowledge, but stated that i'm not the only one to have seen it, because he was listening to public radio the night before, and he heard reports of sightings, as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two ufo's hovering over the trees and fence in our back yard. one to the left, the other directly in our view above back fence.

content.detailedDescription: I love in alabama. me and my wife at the time was on our porch looking at the stars. then i notice one that i thought was the north star cause it was so bright but want where it should be. i seen the north star then this what i thought was another star started moving. then it would shoot miles across the sky in the blink of an eye sit there for minutes. after a while it would go back to the spot it was originally. i got my video camera out and video it for little bit. nothing man made is that fast. it wasn't shooting star i've seen them before. this was lot faster and never burned out. i've got it on video for proof
content.summary: It was night stars was out. it was in the sky like a star but it moved so fast across the sky it was un real nothing man made is that fast. i got video of it

content.detailedDescription: Facts only i went to sleep on april 1st 2017 then was awake on board craft felt like i blinked then we we high up but descending .That i felt a sudden drop but i was under control .Able to no loose any balance. i felt sharp turns. then .We landed. i got out seen two glowing lights as a landmark free floating above the ground .It was still night because it seemed dark. i saw a building covered or looked to be sprayed with sand . i felt as if i was being rushed or pulled inside. i saw people .Then one woman. i was so happy feeling like love,joy,peace,happiness to the highest level i've ever felt before ever! i went over to the woman reached out to see if i could touch her .I did but she felt like my hand then arm was passing through or into her being? it felt like a light weight silicon jelly!?  or something. i touched her lower back area. she felt me touching her and turned and was happy,or smiling. back at me. then we kissed! my happy feeling turned to a nervous one. and next thing i new i was coming back into my bedroom at home. but i could see myself and for a second or two could hear my self snoring. then i woke up. and could remember everything. and much much more. i'm now expering a super download of information. stuff i never new before. it just keeps coming.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I went on board then could see everything like looking out window

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from a photo shoot. i happened to look up and jokingly said, "look, it's a ufo". then, we got looking at it, and noticed the odd shape and lights, and the fact that it seemed to be diving towards the ground. it was disc-shaped, and very large, with a lot of blinking lights. it hovered, flew straight ahead, and descended. we chased it for about five miles before we lost sight of it...Not sure where it went after that. we tried to get pics, but i couldn't get them from the car and we didn't dare stop or we would have lost it sooner than we did. we were all kind of freaking out, because we all saw the same thing, and it was no plane, helicopter, or drone, at least as far as we could tell.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc-shaped, red and white blinking lights, very large, hovering, flying, and descending, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Picture of wife on cuba beach.December 2014.
content.summary: Picture of wife on cuban beach.

content.detailedDescription:
***taken from my blog where i wrote about my encounter***

on the evening of the 9th of ‎march ‎2017, i was witness to a ufo over the skies of lincolnshire in england on a long stretch of road between the villages of gosberton and dowsby.

it was a cool evening and almost dark, with no street lights nearby and very little around me apart from flat fields which are typical for this part of the country, with only the odd tree and a few bushes to break up the dull landscape.

on the night in question i was travelling from gosberton to the market town of bourne, by way of dowsby, while at work as a supermarket delivery driver. while travelling west along the long fen road i noticed a small, white light in the sky directly ahead of me, completely on its own. at first i paid it no mind as it just looked like any other star you would see in the night sky. but shortly afterwards i began to wonder why there was only the one star with no others visible at the time.

this puzzled me and, seeing as i had a good bit of spare time before i was due to make my next delivery, i decided to pull over and take a short break. the road was deserted and so i parked at the side to relax for a few minutes. i was intrigued by what i was seeing and was wondering why only a single star would be visible. i thought about it for a short while but then came to the conclusion that rather than being a star, it is probably the international space station. after all, it seemed to be too close to be a star.

i took out my phone and, seeing that i had a 4g connection, googled “space stations” and the first result was the website for nasa's "spot the station" page, which i tapped on to see what information the site contained regarding what i could see in front of me. i looked around on the website out of curiosity and found a list of about twenty different times that week that the iss would be visible from my location. i looked at the time and it was ‏‎18:41 pm.

what puzzled me was the fact that this time wasn’t listed on the website for that day. i forget the exact times but i can say that they were all am times, with no listings for pm or evening times. i thought this was quite odd and assumed maybe it was a mistake on the site, so i tried to find any other lists of times that would correspond to my sighting for that day. again, the two other lists of times i found online were exactly the same as the first one.

it was at this point that i began to wonder if what i was seeing actually wasn’t a star or the iss, but something… else. but what, exactly? i wanted to try and find out.

other thoughts began to occur to me. was there another space station that i was unaware of? i assumed there was only the iss, but i supposed it was possible that any country with a space program could have one; russia, china, india… so again, i googled “space stations”. turns out there are a few, or have been. like i thought, china does in fact have two up there, the tiangong-2 and the defunct tiangong-1, so that makes for a total of three. however, upon looking for the tiangong-1 & 2 visibility times, they too did not correspond to the time it currently was.

so… it’s not a star or a space station. perhaps it’s a planet? i knew that mercury, venus and mars could be seen by the naked eye and upon googling it, i learned that both jupiter and saturn could also be seen. 

so was it one of these planets i was looking at? time was getting on a bit now and i would have to make a move soon if i wanted to stay on schedule with my deliveries, but i had to know what i was looking at.
back to google, i typed in “which planets are visible tonight from lincolnshire uk”. it loaded for a moment and then the list of results came up, but this is when the truly bizarre thing happened. before i began reading or tapping on links, i looked up at the small white light in the sky, still hovering where it had been, and then… it vanished for one second. gone. then it came back for probably two seconds… and then it was gone again. it didn’t come back.

i was stunned. what the hell was that? where had it gone? it couldn’t have been clouds passing in front of it, the disappearance was too sudden. i felt excitement and anxiety, with a good helping of puzzlement as well. i waited around 5 minutes for it to reappear, but it didn’t. i would have waited longer, but sadly i needed to continue on with my delivery run and was beginning to fall behind.

the object in question can be seen in the center of the sky in the attached photo. i am kicking myself that i did not get it on video, but at least i was able to get one photo before it vanished.
content.summary: I was witness to a star-like ufo while at work making deliveries.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:30 in the evening on december 29, 2014. i was sitting on my front porch swing which faces west. i had just moved to florida 2 months ago and i was enjoying the warm evening and the night sky (more stars than ny where i came from). suddenly, i saw two bright orange orbs come from the south west. they were traveling at an even pace with each other but at a slight distance apart (one in front of the other). the one in the front disappeared behind trees. at this time, another glowing orb appeared from the same direction traveling faster than the other two. it seemed to be "catching up" to the others. the second orb then went behind the trees.  the third, still at a faster pace, a few seconds later, then disappeared behind the trees.  there was no sound from the lights.  i have a direct point of reference as to the size of the lights: about 1/4 mile away there is an electric tower with a flashing red light on top.  the orange lights were approximately the same size as the tower light, but they seemed higher in the sky.  the whole scenario took maybe 30 seconds before all three of the lights disappeared from my line of vision behind the trees. i cannot be positive they changed direction due to trees, but it did seem they made a soft westerly turn. as soon as i saw these orbs/lights, my first thought was, "holy s- - -! i'm seeing ufos!"  i got chills and gooseflesh. i don't believe i even blinked during the time i watched.

i called 911.  two deputies came about 15 minutes later even though i told 911 this was an "fyi" and they didn't need to send anyone over. the deputies asked me a few questions.  i asked if they had any other similar calls, but they couldn't say.
content.summary: Three bright orange orbs. two leading at same pace, followed by another which was traveling faster, seeming to try to catch up. sw to w

content.detailedDescription: On may 12 2017 at 1140 p.M. we were driving on route 8 and just approaching route 77 near centerville pennsylvania. noticed orange and white lights flashing, moving incredibly fast across the sky in front of us....We said, that can't be an airplane...It's moving like mach 10 speed.  we then saw it do a hard turn, like a right angle turn and it just stopped and hovered with the lights being solid now.  we thought...Is it a helicopter....They don't move that fast nor do they stop in mid air like that.....After about 15 seconds of watching this staying still on a very clear cloudless sky, it vanished.  we then realized that we just witnessed something very amazing that was without any doubts, from another world. exciting, beautiful, mysterious.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange white flashing lights darting across sky
